00031 #include <sys/param.h>
00032 #include <sys/socket.h>
00033 #include <sys/poll.h>
00034 #include <sys/types.h>
00035 #include <sys/stat.h>
00036 #include <netinet/in.h>
00037 
00038 #include <stdio.h>
00039 #include <stdlib.h>
00040 #include <string.h>
00041 #include <memory.h>
00042 #include <fcntl.h>
00043 #include <errno.h>
00044 #include <unistd.h>
00045 /* For nanosleep() */
00046 #include <time.h>
00047 
00048 #include "svcgssd.h"
00049 #include "err_util.h"
00050 
00051 /*
00052  * nfs4 in-kernel cache implementation make upcall failed directly
00053  * if there's no listener detected. so here we should keep the init
00054  * channel file open as possible as we can.
00055  *
00056  * unfortunately the proc doesn't support dir change notification.
00057  * and when an entry get unlinked, we only got POLLIN event once,
00058  * it's the only oppotunity we can close the file and startover.
00059  */
00060 void
00061 svcgssd_run()
00062 {
00063         int                     ret;
00064         FILE                    *f = NULL;
00065         struct pollfd           pollfd;
00066         struct timespec         halfsec = { .tv_sec = 0, .tv_nsec = 500000000 };
00067 
00068 #define NULLRPC_FILE "/proc/net/rpc/auth.sptlrpc.init/channel"
00069 
00070         while (1) {
00071                 int save_err;
00072 
00073                 while (f == NULL) {
00074                         f = fopen(NULLRPC_FILE, "rw");
00075                         if (f == NULL) {
00076                                 printerr(4, "failed to open %s: %s\n",
00077                                          NULLRPC_FILE, strerror(errno));
00078                                 nanosleep(&halfsec, NULL);
00079                         } else {
00080                                 printerr(1, "successfully open %s\n",
00081                                          NULLRPC_FILE);
00082                                 break;
00083                         }
00084                 }
00085                 pollfd.fd = fileno(f);
00086                 pollfd.events = POLLIN;
00087 
00088                 pollfd.revents = 0;
00089                 ret = poll(&pollfd, 1, 1000);
00090                 save_err = errno;
00091 
00092                 if (ret < 0) {
00093                         printerr(0, "error return from poll: %s\n",
00094                                  strerror(save_err));
00095                         fclose(f);
00096                         f = NULL;
00097                 } else if (ret == 0) {
00098                         printerr(3, "poll timeout\n");
00099                 } else {
00100                         if (ret != 1) {
00101                                 printerr(0, "bug: unexpected poll return %d\n",
00102                                                 ret);
00103                                 exit(1);
00104                         }
00105                         if (pollfd.revents & POLLIN) {
00106                                 if (handle_nullreq(f) < 0) {
00107                                         fclose(f);
00108                                         f = NULL;
00109                                 }
00110                         }
00111                 }
00112         }
00113 }
